transcript.speaker: Speaker 1
transcript.text: Charlie: Hi, I'm calling from CloudFlow CRM. Am I speaking to William Clark?

transcript.speaker: Speaker 1
transcript.text: Elijah: Yeah, that's me.

transcript.speaker: Speaker 1
transcript.text: Charlie: Hey, how are you doing?

transcript.speaker: Speaker 1
transcript.text: Elijah: Pretty good. Who is this again?

transcript.speaker: Speaker 1
transcript.text: Charlie: I'm Charlie Brown with CloudFlow.

transcript.speaker: Speaker 1
transcript.text: Charlie: We are a CRM platform designed for growing businesses,

transcript.speaker: Speaker 1
transcript.text: Charlie: helping to organize customer data and improve sales process.

transcript.speaker: Speaker 1
transcript.text: Charlie: I was wondering if you have a couple of minutes to chat.

transcript.speaker: Speaker 1
transcript.text: Elijah: I guess so. What's this about?

transcript.speaker: Speaker 1
transcript.text: Charlie: Well, I'm reaching out because we've worked with business similar to yours

transcript.speaker: Speaker 1
transcript.text: Charlie: who were managing customers' info manually, like through a spreadsheet.

transcript.speaker: Speaker 1
transcript.text: Charlie: and we've helped them save hours each week by automating the process.

transcript.speaker: Speaker 1
transcript.text: Charlie: Out of curiosity, what system are you using currently for tracking your customer interaction?

transcript.speaker: Speaker 1
transcript.text: Elijah: Honestly, we're still using spreadsheets. It's a bit messy.

transcript.speaker: Speaker 1
transcript.text: Charlie: I hear that a lot.

transcript.speaker: Speaker 1
transcript.text: Charlie: Cloud Flow makes it super easy to centralize everything in one place.

transcript.speaker: Speaker 1
transcript.text: Charlie: Plus, our users typically see an increase of 20% in follow-ups,

transcript.speaker: Speaker 1
transcript.text: Charlie: which often leads to more closed deals.

transcript.speaker: Speaker 1
transcript.text: Charlie: would it make sense to explore

transcript.speaker: Speaker 1
transcript.text: Charlie: how this could be possible to help your team?

transcript.speaker: Speaker 1
transcript.text: Elijah: Yeah, I think it's worth a look.

transcript.speaker: Speaker 1
transcript.text: Charlie: Awesome.

transcript.speaker: Speaker 1
transcript.text: Charlie: How does Thursday afternoon sound for a 15-minute demo?

transcript.speaker: Speaker 1
transcript.text: Elijah: Thursday works.

transcript.speaker: Speaker 1
transcript.text: Elijah: Let's say 2 p.m.

transcript.speaker: Speaker 1
transcript.text: Charlie: Perfect.

transcript.speaker: Speaker 1
transcript.text: Charlie: I'll send in the calendar invite for Thursday 2 p.m.

transcript.speaker: Speaker 1
transcript.text: Elijah: Thanks.

transcript.speaker: Speaker 1
transcript.text: Charlie: And I'm looking forward to showing you

transcript.speaker: Speaker 1
transcript.text: Charlie: how CloudFlow can make things easier for your team.

transcript.speaker: Speaker 1
transcript.text: Elijah: Thank you.
